mapper.select:
SELECT /* statisQuery.saleCompanys */ COM.COMPANY_NAME , SUM(BAL.TOTAL_SALE_COUNT) AS TOTAL_SALE_COUNT , SUM(BAL.TOTAL_SALE_PRICE) AS TOTAL_SALE_PRICE , (SELECT CD_DETAIL FROM CD WHERE CD = BAL.SALE_TYPE) AS SALE_DEVICE , DATE_FORMAT(BAL.SALE_STR_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') AS SALE_STR_DATE , DATE_FORMAT(BAL.SALE_END_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') AS SALE_END_DATE FROM BALANCE BAL, COMPANY COM WHERE 1=1 AND COM.COMPANY_MGMTNO = BAL.COMPANY_MGMTNO AND COM.COMPANY_TYPE='SC'
AND COM.COMPANY_NAME like '%${searchQuery}%'
AND DATE_FORMAT(BAL.SALE_STR_DATE, '%Y-%m') >= '${searchStrDate}'
AND DATE_FORMAT(BAL.SALE_END_DATE, '%Y-%m') <= '${searchEndDate}'
GROUP BY BAL.COMPANY_MGMTNO
ORDER BY BAL.BALANCE_MGMTNO DESC
ORDER BY SUM(BAL.TOTAL_SALE_PRICE) DESC
LIMIT #{ startRownum }, #{ perPage }

SELECT /* statisQuery.saleCompanysCount */ COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT COM.COMPANY_NAME , SUM(BAL.TOTAL_SALE_COUNT) AS TOTAL_SALE_COUNT , SUM(BAL.TOTAL_SALE_PRICE) AS TOTAL_SALE_PRICE , (SELECT CD_DETAIL FROM CD WHERE CD = BAL.SALE_TYPE) AS SALE_DEVICE , DATE_FORMAT(BAL.SALE_STR_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') AS SALE_STR_DATE , DATE_FORMAT(BAL.SALE_END_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') AS SALE_END_DATE FROM BALANCE BAL, COMPANY COM WHERE 1=1 AND COM.COMPANY_MGMTNO = BAL.COMPANY_MGMTNO AND COM.COMPANY_TYPE='SC'
AND COM.COMPANY_NAME like '%${searchQuery}%'
AND DATE_FORMAT(BAL.SALE_STR_DATE, '%Y-%m') >= '${searchStrDate}'
AND DATE_FORMAT(BAL.SALE_END_DATE, '%Y-%m') <= '${searchEndDate}'
GROUP BY BAL.COMPANY_MGMTNO ) A

SELECT /* statisQuery.products */ CON.NAME AS contents_name , CON.CONTENTS_CD AS contents_cd , SUM(BALD.SALE_COUNT) AS TOTAL_SALE_COUNT , SUM(BALD.SALE_PRICE) AS TOTAL_SALE_PRICE , (SELECT CD_DETAIL FROM CD WHERE CD = BAL.SALE_TYPE) AS SALE_DEVICE , DATE_FORMAT(BAL.SALE_STR_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') AS SALE_STR_DATE , DATE_FORMAT(BAL.SALE_END_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') AS SALE_END_DATE FROM BALANCE BAL, COMPANY COM, BALANCE_DETAIL BALD, CONTENTS CON WHERE 1=1 AND COM.COMPANY_MGMTNO = BAL.COMPANY_MGMTNO AND BAL.BALANCE_MGMTNO = BALD.BALANCE_MGMTNO AND CON.CONTENTS_CD = BALD.CONTENTS_CD AND COM.COMPANY_TYPE='SC'
AND CON.NAME like '%${searchQuery}%'
AND DATE_FORMAT(BAL.SALE_STR_DATE, '%Y-%m') >= '${searchStrDate}'
AND DATE_FORMAT(BAL.SALE_END_DATE, '%Y-%m') <= '${searchEndDate}'
GROUP BY BAL.SALE_TYPE, BALD.CONTENTS_CD
ORDER BY BAL.BALANCE_MGMTNO DESC
ORDER BY SUM(BALD.SALE_PRICE) DESC
LIMIT #{ startRownum }, #{ perPage }

SELECT /* statisQuery.productsCount */ COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT CON.NAME AS contents_name , CON.CONTENTS_CD AS contents_cd , SUM(BALD.SALE_COUNT) AS TOTAL_SALE_COUNT , SUM(BALD.SALE_PRICE) AS TOTAL_SALE_PRICE , (SELECT CD_DETAIL FROM CD WHERE CD = BAL.SALE_TYPE) AS SALE_DEVICE , DATE_FORMAT(BAL.SALE_STR_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') AS SALE_STR_DATE , DATE_FORMAT(BAL.SALE_END_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') AS SALE_END_DATE FROM BALANCE BAL, COMPANY COM, BALANCE_DETAIL BALD, CONTENTS CON WHERE 1=1 AND COM.COMPANY_MGMTNO = BAL.COMPANY_MGMTNO AND BAL.BALANCE_MGMTNO = BALD.BALANCE_MGMTNO AND CON.CONTENTS_CD = BALD.CONTENTS_CD AND COM.COMPANY_TYPE='SC'
AND CON.NAME like '%${searchQuery}%'
AND DATE_FORMAT(BAL.SALE_STR_DATE, '%Y-%m') >= '${searchStrDate}'
AND DATE_FORMAT(BAL.SALE_END_DATE, '%Y-%m') <= '${searchEndDate}'
GROUP BY BAL.SALE_TYPE, BALD.CONTENTS_CD ) A

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT /* statisQuery.saleCompanysPieGraph */ COM.COMPANY_NAME , SUM(BAL.TOTAL_SALE_COUNT) AS TOTAL_SALE_COUNT , SUM(BAL.TOTAL_SALE_PRICE) AS TOTAL_SALE_PRICE , (SELECT CD_DETAIL FROM CD WHERE CD = BAL.SALE_TYPE) AS SALE_DEVICE , DATE_FORMAT(BAL.SALE_STR_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') AS SALE_STR_DATE , DATE_FORMAT(BAL.SALE_END_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') AS SALE_END_DATE FROM BALANCE BAL, COMPANY COM WHERE 1=1 AND COM.COMPANY_MGMTNO = BAL.COMPANY_MGMTNO AND COM.COMPANY_TYPE='SC'
AND DATE_FORMAT(BAL.SALE_END_DATE, '%Y-%m') = '${searchEndDate}'
GROUP BY BAL.COMPANY_MGMTNO ORDER BY BAL.TOTAL_SALE_COUNT ) A ORDER BY A.TOTAL_SALE_COUNT DESC

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT /* statisQuery.productsPieGraph */ CON.NAME AS contents_name , CON.CONTENTS_CD AS contents_cd , SUM(BALD.SALE_COUNT) AS TOTAL_SALE_COUNT , SUM(BALD.SALE_PRICE * BALD.SALE_COUNT) AS TOTAL_SALE_PRICE , (SELECT CD_DETAIL FROM CD WHERE CD = BAL.SALE_TYPE) AS SALE_DEVICE , DATE_FORMAT(BAL.SALE_STR_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') AS SALE_STR_DATE , DATE_FORMAT(BAL.SALE_END_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') AS SALE_END_DATE FROM BALANCE BAL, COMPANY COM, BALANCE_DETAIL BALD, CONTENTS CON WHERE 1=1 AND COM.COMPANY_MGMTNO = BAL.COMPANY_MGMTNO AND BAL.BALANCE_MGMTNO = BALD.BALANCE_MGMTNO AND CON.CONTENTS_CD = BALD.CONTENTS_CD AND COM.COMPANY_TYPE='SC'
AND DATE_FORMAT(BAL.SALE_END_DATE, '%Y-%m') = '${searchEndDate}'
GROUP BY BAL.SALE_TYPE, BALD.CONTENTS_CD ORDER BY BAL.TOTAL_SALE_COUNT ) A ORDER BY A.TOTAL_SALE_COUNT DESC

SELECT /* statisQuery.saleCompanysLineGraph */ COM.COMPANY_NAME, COM.COMPANY_MGMTNO FROM BALANCE BAL, COMPANY COM WHERE 1=1 AND COM.COMPANY_MGMTNO = BAL.COMPANY_MGMTNO AND COM.COMPANY_TYPE='SC' GROUP BY BAL.COMPANY_MGMTNO ORDER BY SUM(BAL.TOTAL_SALE_COUNT) DESC

SELECT /* statisQuery.productsLineGraph */ CON.NAME AS contents_name, BALD.CONTENTS_CD FROM BALANCE BAL, COMPANY COM, BALANCE_DETAIL BALD, CONTENTS CON WHERE 1=1 AND COM.COMPANY_MGMTNO = BAL.COMPANY_MGMTNO AND BAL.BALANCE_MGMTNO = BALD.BALANCE_MGMTNO AND CON.CONTENTS_CD = BALD.CONTENTS_CD AND COM.COMPANY_TYPE='SC' GROUP BY BALD.CONTENTS_CD ORDER BY SUM(BAL.TOTAL_SALE_COUNT) DESC

SELECT /* statisQuery.lineGraphMonthCount*/ IFNULL( (SELECT SUM(BAL.TOTAL_SALE_COUNT) AS TOTAL_SALE_COUNT FROM BALANCE BAL WHERE 1=1 AND BAL.COMPANY_MGMTNO = ${company_mgmtno} AND DATE_FORMAT(BAL.SALE_END_DATE, '%Y') = ${searchEndDate} AND DATE_FORMAT(BAL.SALE_END_DATE, '%m') = '01' ), 0) AS '01' , IFNULL( (SELECT SUM(BAL.TOTAL_SALE_COUNT) AS TOTAL_SALE_COUNT FROM BALANCE BAL WHERE 1=1 AND BAL.COMPANY_MGMTNO = ${company_mgmtno} AND DATE_FORMAT(BAL.SALE_END_DATE, '%Y') = ${searchEndDate} AND DATE_FORMAT(BAL.SALE_END_DATE, '%m') = '02' ), 0) AS '02' , IFNULL( (SELECT SUM(BAL.TOTAL_SALE_COUNT) AS TOTAL_SALE_COUNT FROM BALANCE BAL WHERE 1=1 AND BAL.COMPANY_MGMTNO = ${company_mgmtno} AND DATE_FORMAT(BAL.SALE_END_DATE, '%Y') = ${searchEndDate} AND DATE_FORMAT(BAL.SALE_END_DATE, '%m') = '03' ), 0) AS '03' , IFNULL( (SELECT SUM(BAL.TOTAL_SALE_COUNT) AS TOTAL_SALE_COUNT FROM BALANCE BAL WHERE 1=1 AND BAL.COMPANY_MGMTNO = ${company_mgmtno} AND DATE_FORMAT(BAL.SALE_END_DATE, '%Y') = ${searchEndDate} AND DATE_FORMAT(BAL.SALE_END_DATE, '%m') = '04' ), 0) AS '04' , IFNULL( (SELECT SUM(BAL.TOTAL_SALE_COUNT) AS TOTAL_SALE_COUNT FROM BALANCE BAL WHERE 1=1 AND BAL.COMPANY_MGMTNO = ${company_mgmtno} AND DATE_FORMAT(BAL.SALE_END_DATE, '%Y') = ${searchEndDate} AND DATE_FORMAT(BAL.SALE_END_DATE, '%m') = '05' ), 0) AS '05' , IFNULL( (SELECT SUM(BAL.TOTAL_SALE_COUNT) AS TOTAL_SALE_COUNT FROM BALANCE BAL WHERE 1=1 AND BAL.COMPANY_MGMTNO = ${company_mgmtno} AND DATE_FORMAT(BAL.SALE_END_DATE, '%Y') = ${searchEndDate} AND DATE_FORMAT(BAL.SALE_END_DATE, '%m') = '06' ), 0) AS '06' , IFNULL( (SELECT SUM(BAL.TOTAL_SALE_COUNT) AS TOTAL_SALE_COUNT FROM BALANCE BAL WHERE 1=1 AND BAL.COMPANY_MGMTNO = ${company_mgmtno} AND DATE_FORMAT(BAL.SALE_END_DATE, '%Y') = ${searchEndDate} AND DATE_FORMAT(BAL.SALE_END_DATE, '%m') = '07' ), 0) AS '07' , IFNULL( (SELECT SUM(BAL.TOTAL_SALE_COUNT) AS TOTAL_SALE_COUNT FROM BALANCE BAL WHERE 1=1 AND BAL.COMPANY_MGMTNO = ${company_mgmtno} AND DATE_FORMAT(BAL.SALE_END_DATE, '%Y') = ${searchEndDate} AND DATE_FORMAT(BAL.SALE_END_DATE, '%m') = '08' ), 0) AS '08' , IFNULL( (SELECT SUM(BAL.TOTAL_SALE_COUNT) AS TOTAL_SALE_COUNT FROM BALANCE BAL WHERE 1=1 AND BAL.COMPANY_MGMTNO = ${company_mgmtno} AND DATE_FORMAT(BAL.SALE_END_DATE, '%Y') = ${searchEndDate} AND DATE_FORMAT(BAL.SALE_END_DATE, '%m') = '09' ), 0) AS '09' , IFNULL( (SELECT SUM(BAL.TOTAL_SALE_COUNT) AS TOTAL_SALE_COUNT FROM BALANCE BAL WHERE 1=1 AND BAL.COMPANY_MGMTNO = ${company_mgmtno} AND DATE_FORMAT(BAL.SALE_END_DATE, '%Y') = ${searchEndDate} AND DATE_FORMAT(BAL.SALE_END_DATE, '%m') = '10' ), 0) AS '10' , IFNULL( (SELECT SUM(BAL.TOTAL_SALE_COUNT) AS TOTAL_SALE_COUNT FROM BALANCE BAL WHERE 1=1 AND BAL.COMPANY_MGMTNO = ${company_mgmtno} AND DATE_FORMAT(BAL.SALE_END_DATE, '%Y') = ${searchEndDate} AND DATE_FORMAT(BAL.SALE_END_DATE, '%m') = '11' ), 0) AS '11' , IFNULL( (SELECT SUM(BAL.TOTAL_SALE_COUNT) AS TOTAL_SALE_COUNT FROM BALANCE BAL WHERE 1=1 AND BAL.COMPANY_MGMTNO = ${company_mgmtno} AND DATE_FORMAT(BAL.SALE_END_DATE, '%Y') = ${searchEndDate} AND DATE_FORMAT(BAL.SALE_END_DATE, '%m') = '12' ), 0) AS '12' FROM DUAL

SELECT /* statisQuery.productsLineGraphMonthCount*/ IFNULL( (SELECT SUM(BALD.SALE_COUNT) AS TOTAL_SALE_COUNT FROM BALANCE BAL, BALANCE_DETAIL BALD WHERE 1=1 AND BAL.BALANCE_MGMTNO = BALD.BALANCE_MGMTNO AND BALD.CONTENTS_CD = '${contents_cd}' AND DATE_FORMAT(BAL.SALE_END_DATE, '%Y') = ${searchEndDate} AND DATE_FORMAT(BAL.SALE_END_DATE, '%m') = '01' ), 0) AS '01' , IFNULL( (SELECT SUM(BALD.SALE_COUNT) AS TOTAL_SALE_COUNT FROM BALANCE BAL, BALANCE_DETAIL BALD WHERE 1=1 AND BAL.BALANCE_MGMTNO = BALD.BALANCE_MGMTNO AND BALD.CONTENTS_CD = '${contents_cd}' AND DATE_FORMAT(BAL.SALE_END_DATE, '%Y') = ${searchEndDate} AND DATE_FORMAT(BAL.SALE_END_DATE, '%m') = '02' ), 0) AS '02' , IFNULL( (SELECT SUM(BALD.SALE_COUNT) AS TOTAL_SALE_COUNT FROM BALANCE BAL, BALANCE_DETAIL BALD WHERE 1=1 AND BAL.BALANCE_MGMTNO = BALD.BALANCE_MGMTNO AND BALD.CONTENTS_CD = '${contents_cd}' AND DATE_FORMAT(BAL.SALE_END_DATE, '%Y') = ${searchEndDate} AND DATE_FORMAT(BAL.SALE_END_DATE, '%m') = '03' ), 0) AS '03' , IFNULL( (SELECT SUM(BAL.TOTAL_SALE_COUNT) AS TOTAL_SALE_COUNT FROM BALANCE BAL WHERE 1=1 AND BAL.COMPANY_MGMTNO = '${company_mgmtno}' AND DATE_FORMAT(BAL.SALE_END_DATE, '%Y') = ${searchEndDate} AND DATE_FORMAT(BAL.SALE_END_DATE, '%m') = '04' ), 0) AS '04' , IFNULL( (SELECT SUM(BALD.SALE_COUNT) AS TOTAL_SALE_COUNT FROM BALANCE BAL, BALANCE_DETAIL BALD WHERE 1=1 AND BAL.BALANCE_MGMTNO = BALD.BALANCE_MGMTNO AND BALD.CONTENTS_CD = '${contents_cd}' AND DATE_FORMAT(BAL.SALE_END_DATE, '%Y') = ${searchEndDate} AND DATE_FORMAT(BAL.SALE_END_DATE, '%m') = '05' ), 0) AS '05' , IFNULL( (SELECT SUM(BALD.SALE_COUNT) AS TOTAL_SALE_COUNT FROM BALANCE BAL, BALANCE_DETAIL BALD WHERE 1=1 AND BAL.BALANCE_MGMTNO = BALD.BALANCE_MGMTNO AND BALD.CONTENTS_CD = '${contents_cd}' AND DATE_FORMAT(BAL.SALE_END_DATE, '%Y') = ${searchEndDate} AND DATE_FORMAT(BAL.SALE_END_DATE, '%m') = '06' ), 0) AS '06' , IFNULL( (SELECT SUM(BALD.SALE_COUNT) AS TOTAL_SALE_COUNT FROM BALANCE BAL, BALANCE_DETAIL BALD WHERE 1=1 AND BAL.BALANCE_MGMTNO = BALD.BALANCE_MGMTNO AND BALD.CONTENTS_CD = '${contents_cd}' AND DATE_FORMAT(BAL.SALE_END_DATE, '%Y') = ${searchEndDate} AND DATE_FORMAT(BAL.SALE_END_DATE, '%m') = '07' ), 0) AS '07' , IFNULL( (SELECT SUM(BAL.TOTAL_SALE_COUNT) AS TOTAL_SALE_COUNT FROM BALANCE BAL WHERE 1=1 AND BAL.COMPANY_MGMTNO = '${company_mgmtno}' AND DATE_FORMAT(BAL.SALE_END_DATE, '%Y') = ${searchEndDate} AND DATE_FORMAT(BAL.SALE_END_DATE, '%m') = '08' ), 0) AS '08' , IFNULL( (SELECT SUM(BALD.SALE_COUNT) AS TOTAL_SALE_COUNT FROM BALANCE BAL, BALANCE_DETAIL BALD WHERE 1=1 AND BAL.BALANCE_MGMTNO = BALD.BALANCE_MGMTNO AND BALD.CONTENTS_CD = '${contents_cd}' AND DATE_FORMAT(BAL.SALE_END_DATE, '%Y') = ${searchEndDate} AND DATE_FORMAT(BAL.SALE_END_DATE, '%m') = '09' ), 0) AS '09' , IFNULL( (SELECT SUM(BALD.SALE_COUNT) AS TOTAL_SALE_COUNT FROM BALANCE BAL, BALANCE_DETAIL BALD WHERE 1=1 AND BAL.BALANCE_MGMTNO = BALD.BALANCE_MGMTNO AND BALD.CONTENTS_CD = '${contents_cd}' AND DATE_FORMAT(BAL.SALE_END_DATE, '%Y') = ${searchEndDate} AND DATE_FORMAT(BAL.SALE_END_DATE, '%m') = '10' ), 0) AS '10' , IFNULL( (SELECT SUM(BALD.SALE_COUNT) AS TOTAL_SALE_COUNT FROM BALANCE BAL, BALANCE_DETAIL BALD WHERE 1=1 AND BAL.BALANCE_MGMTNO = BALD.BALANCE_MGMTNO AND BALD.CONTENTS_CD = '${contents_cd}' AND DATE_FORMAT(BAL.SALE_END_DATE, '%Y') = ${searchEndDate} AND DATE_FORMAT(BAL.SALE_END_DATE, '%m') = '11' ), 0) AS '11' , IFNULL( (SELECT SUM(BALD.SALE_COUNT) AS TOTAL_SALE_COUNT FROM BALANCE BAL, BALANCE_DETAIL BALD WHERE 1=1 AND BAL.BALANCE_MGMTNO = BALD.BALANCE_MGMTNO AND BALD.CONTENTS_CD = '${contents_cd}' AND DATE_FORMAT(BAL.SALE_END_DATE, '%Y') = ${searchEndDate} AND DATE_FORMAT(BAL.SALE_END_DATE, '%m') = '12' ), 0) AS '12' FROM DUAL
